description: This file appears to be a C++ source implementation of an MTA_Agent class for handling various network parameter operations, including registration, parameter get/set/attributes, adding/deleting table rows, health checks, and session management. It also contains external C functions for lower-level SDK calls.

classes.name: MTA_Agent
classes.description: Main class implementing agent functions for managing parameters, sessions, and health status, integrating with lower-level ssp SDK functions.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Registers the agent with the component registry.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Unregisters the agent from the component registry.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_Init(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Initializes the agent, registers with the component registry, and prepares for operation.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_GetParameterValues(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves the value(s) of specified parameter(s).

methods.name: void MTA_agent_SetParameterValues(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the value of specified parameter(s) and validates the set.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_GetParameterNames(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves parameter names, matching against a provided list.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_GetParameterAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Fetches attribute information for a specified parameter.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_SetParameterAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets attribute information (access and notify) for a parameter and validates.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_Commit(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Commits parameter changes and validates the update.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_GetParameterNames_NextLevel(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Lists parameter names at the next hierarchy level.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_AddTbl(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Adds a row instance to a parameter (e.g., table).

methods.name: void MTA_agent_DelTble(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Deletes a row instance from a parameter (e.g., table).

methods.name: void MTA_agent_GetHealth(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves the health status of a component.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_SetSessionId(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the session ID for a component, with override control.

methods.name: void MTA_agent_Terminate(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Terminates the current session of the MTA agent.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the agent with a specific version; returns success status.
